caption.p: Effects of the experimental diets on (A) serum alanine transaminase (ALT) and aspartate transaminase (AST) levels and (B) hepatic glutathione (GSH) concentration in mice. The choline-deficient and soy protein diets (CDD and SPD, respectively) decrease GSH concentration compared to normal diet. Each bar represents the meanÂ±SEM. Different letters (a,b) indicate significant differences among diets ( P <0.05).
